name: Parkolor
description:
Game made for Epic Mega Jam 2018, developed only by me

Is a parkour game with puzzle elements. Using the colors to make a different game mechanic (In menu have options for colorblind people).

Can be played in keyboard or controller.

Keyboard (XBox Controller)

WASD (Analog) - Walk
Space (A) - Jump
E or Q (RT) - Change color (In order)
1 (B) - Red 
2 (Y) - Green
3 (X) - Blue
